Message:
A normal witch would’ve
instantly died after
getting hit by that attack,

Every nerve in their body was
ripped apart, but that wasn’t
enough for death to claim them.

Even now, I can still hear
their screams calling out
to me in the darkness.

So, with my own two hands,
I put their pain at ease.

each and every
one of them...
with this pistol.

And yet, they held no
grudges towards me.
Not a single tear was shed.

I pulled the trigger for
the last time, and heard
the dry sound of the empty
cartridge falling onto the dirt.

Then, she appeared as if
she was lying in wait
this whole time—
